alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laurens, Dodge and east central Pulaski Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Eastman. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Rhine, Chauncey, Union, Jay Bird Springs, Five Points, Plainfield and Godwinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
